<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fu Water](/Equipment.aspx?ID=987)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 161 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 21 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Burnt fulu ashes float in this liquid, lending a distinctive red color and imparting it with a variety of purifying effects. Unlike many [fulu](/equipment/consumables/fulu) items, _fu water_ must be created using [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) magic.

<document level="2" id="action-784" />

<document level="2" id="action-785" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Fu Water
